verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> ha-Yah, came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> yo-'El that came to Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פְּתוּאֵֽל׃ <WH6602> pe-tu-'El. of Pethuel
